objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has delivered initial payloads hidden using archives and encoding measures.(Citation: Anomali MUSTANG PANDA October 2019)(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE PRESIDENT December 2019)(Citation: Recorded Future REDDELTA July 2020)(Citation: Crowdstrike MUSTANG PANDA June 2018)(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 November 2020)(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 Europe March 2022)(Citation: Unit42 Bookworm Nov2015) (Citation: Sophos PlugX September 2022)(Citation: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025)(Citation: Zscaler) [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also utilized opaque predicates in payloads to hinder analysis.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)
